column4: Today is #NationalFirstRespondersDay - I‚Äôm grateful for the sacrifices they make every day. For the heroes on the frontline fighting COVID-19 or risking their lives running into burning buildings, I‚Äôm fighting every day to make sure these heroes get the hazard pay they deserve!

The White House just put out a list of ‚ÄúFirst Term Accomplishments.‚Äù 

Among them is ‚ÄúEnding the COVID-19 Pandemic.‚Äù

In the real world, 226,000 Americans died. 50,000 are in the hospital. We‚Äôve had half a million new cases this week! We can‚Äôt let this president get a 2nd term.

By confirming Judge Barrett tonight, Republicans are making clear that they stand with the President in this shameful scheme to rip away health care from millions in the middle of a once-in-a-century pandemic.

....a nominee who threatens the progress our country has made over the years to expand access to health care, protect the LGBTQ+ community from discrimination, address the threat of climate change, and guarantee that women can make their own health care decisions.

One year ago today, long before COVID-19 appeared, @JoeBiden warned us that President Trump wasn‚Äôt prepared for a pandemic. 

But Donald Trump didn‚Äôt listen. 

A President‚Äôs bad judgment does have consequences. https://t.co/jZXxmOJehw

My former colleague @MarkMeadows said on CNN this morning that we‚Äôre ‚Äúnot going to control the pandemic.‚Äù

This kind of defeatist attitude has no place in the White House. We need to elect @joebiden.

First of all, Rep. Omar is out of his league.

Let‚Äôs send him back to Trump Tower in 17 days.
